title: Ticket #5149: Ad parser used in condor_advertise ignores ad field names sometimes
description: I was constructng a file to to be read by condor_advertise and I eventually tracked down that the ads were being ignored because neither Name nor Machine fields could be found. The issue was a tab before the field names and I assume any white space would be the same.
remarks:
2015-Jul-14 14:47:39 by bt:
This would be the collector parser since it was the collector ignoring the ads when it could find neither Name nor Machine
creator: bt
